ValidationRule.description: #SAL-466 : Risk Reason field is required if Risk Level field is Medium or High.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Setup.CMM_ObjectSaveMode__c.IsVRBypassed__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(RiskLevel__c, 'Medium'), ISPICKVAL(RiskLevel__c, 'High') ), ISBLANK( RiskReason__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Risk Reason field is required if Risk Level field is Medium or High.
